com.snap2d.ui

Class RenderedLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snap2d.ui.RenderedLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable, KeyEventClient, MouseEventClient

    public class RenderedLayout
extends Object
implements Renderable, MouseEventClient, KeyEventClient
    Provides a mechanism for rendering UI components to the screen using the rendering engine's default interface. RenderedLayout keeps and manages a collection of RenderedCopmonents that it is responsible for rendering, updating, resizing, and animating. It implements the MouseEventClient and KeyEventClient interfaces so that it can be registered with an InputDispatch to forward input events to child components.

    Note: It is recommended that this class be handled by only one thread at a time, or is externally synchronized, as it frequently interfaces with non-thread-safe Java Collections.
    Author:
    Brian Groenke

      • onResize

        public void onResize(Dimension oldSize,
            Dimension newSize)
        Applies auto-scaling/translation to all children if configured to do so. The child's onResize method is invoked after scaling has occurred.
        Specified by:
        onResize in interface Renderable
        Parameters:
        oldSize - the original size of the context (may be null if not yet available).
        newSize - the new size of the grahpics context. This should never be null.
